SELECT PTS.TC_SEQ, PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, CASE PTR.TR_TRACK_TYPE WHEN 'TYP00' THEN "공동" WHEN 'TYP01' THEN "단독" END AS TR_TRACK_TYPE, PTS.TC_DAY, PTS.TC_DAY2, -- # PTS.TC_STEP, -- # PTS.TC_REG_DT, PTS.COMP_NAME, PRM.RM_TYPE, PRM.D_SEQ, PRM.D_NAME, PRM.N_DCCP_YN, PD.D_EDU, PD.D_EDU_END_DT, PRM.R_ID, PRM.RM_W_CH, PRM.W_ID, PRM.C_CODE, PRM.RM_R_YN, PRM.RM_W_YN, PRM.RM_R_MOD_DT, PRM.RM_W_MOD_DT, PTS.TC_REG_DT FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM ON PTS.TC_SEQ = PRM.TC_SEQ AND PRM.TC_DAY = #{testDate} LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_DRIVER PD on PRM.D_SEQ = PD.D_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TRACK_RESERV PTR on PTS.TC_SEQ = PTR.TC_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND #{testDate} BETWEEN PTS.TC_DAY AND PTS.TC_DAY2 AND PRM.RM_IN_OUT = 'O' AND PRM.RM_TYPE = 'D' AND PTS.TC_APPROVAL = '3'
AND ( PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') OR PTS.COMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') OR PRM.D_NAME = #{enText} )
GROUP BY PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, PRM.D_SEQ, PRM.C_CODE ORDER BY PRM.D_SEQ ASC, PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE ASC

SELECT PTS.TC_SEQ FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM ON PTS.TC_SEQ = PRM.TC_SEQ AND PRM.TC_DAY = #{testDate} LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_DRIVER PD on PRM.D_SEQ = PD.D_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TRACK_RESERV PTR on PTS.TC_SEQ = PTR.TC_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND #{testDate} BETWEEN PTS.TC_DAY AND PTS.TC_DAY2 AND PRM.RM_IN_OUT = 'O' AND PRM.RM_TYPE = 'D' AND PTS.TC_APPROVAL = '3'
AND ( PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') OR PTS.COMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') OR PRM.D_NAME = #{enText} )
GROUP BY PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, PRM.D_SEQ, PRM.C_CODE ORDER BY PRM.D_SEQ ASC, PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE ASC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (order by PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE) as num , PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE , PTS.TC_DAY , PTS.TC_DAY2 , PTS.COMP_NAME , COUNT(*) as dup FROM PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS ON PTS.TC_SEQ = PRM.TC_SEQ and PTS.TC_DAY = PRM.TC_DAY LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_DRIVER PD on PRM.D_SEQ = PD.D_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND PRM.TC_DAY = #{testDate} AND PRM.RM_IN_OUT = 'O' AND PRM.RM_TYPE = 'D' AND PTS.TC_APPROVAL = '3'

SELECT PTS.TC_SEQ, PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, PTS.TC_DAY, PTS.TC_DAY2, PRM.RM_TYPE, PRM.R_ID, PRM.C_CODE, PC.C_NUMBER, PRM.RM_R_YN, PRM.RM_R_MOD_DT FROM PG_TEST_SCHDULE PTS LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM ON PTS.TC_SEQ = PRM.TC_SEQ AND PRM.TC_DAY = #{testDate} LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_CAR PC ON PRM.C_CODE = PC.C_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND #{testDate} BETWEEN PTS.TC_DAY AND PTS.TC_DAY2 AND PRM.RM_IN_OUT = 'O' AND PRM.RM_TYPE = 'C' AND PTS.TC_APPROVAL = '3' GROUP BY PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE, PRM.C_CODE ORDER BY PTS.TC_RESERV_CODE ASC

SELECT PRM.RM_SEQ, PHD.NAME, PHD.EMPLOYEE_NO, PHD.CRN_DTM, MAX(PRM.TC_DAY) as TC_DAY, PHR.R_RETURN FROM PG_RESOURCE_MAPPING PRM LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_HINT_DRIVER PHD on PRM.D_SEQ = PHD.EMPLOYEE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN PG_HINT_RESOURCE PHR on PHD.EMPLOYEE_NO = PHR.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE PRM.RM_IN_OUT = 'I' AND PRM.RM_TYPE = 'D' AND PRM.N_DCCP_YN = 'N' AND PRM.TC_DAY < DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d')
AND ( PRM.D_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') OR PHD.EMPLOYEE_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') )
AND PRM.TC_DAY BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{edDate}
GROUP BY PHD.EMPLOYEE_NO
